      • canUseToolCard

        public boolean canUseToolCard(Player player,
                              ToolCard toolCard)
        return true or false according to you can or not use a toolcard
        Parameters:
        toolCard - tool card you want to use
        Returns:
        true - able to use tool card, false - not able to use tool card

      • useToolCard

        public void useToolCard(Player player,
                        ToolCard toolCard)
        Use a ToolCard. The ToolCard is only "activated" and will enable the use of different methods and change the rules for the positioning of the dices: WindowFrame.isPositionValid(Dice, Position, ToolCard).
        Parameters:
        toolCard - given tool card

      • isToolCardUsed

        public boolean isToolCardUsed(Player player)

      • changeDiceValue

        public void changeDiceValue(Player player,
                            Position position,
                            boolean increase)
        according to a tool card effect change the value of a dice
        Parameters:
        position - where put the dice
        increase - the value

      • movePlacedDice

        public void movePlacedDice(Player player,
                           Position curPosition,
                           Position newPosition)
        Move an already placed dice. The positioning rules depend on the ToolCard currently in use. Move enabled by ToolCard2 and ToolCard3
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        curPosition - the position of the dice to move
        newPosition - the target position of the dice

      • movePlacedDices

        public void movePlacedDices(Player player,
                            Position curPosition1,
                            Position newPosition1,
                            Position curPosition2,
                            Position newPosition2)
        Move two placed dices respecting all the positioning rules. Move enabled by ToolCard4.
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        curPosition1 - the position of the first dice
        newPosition1 - the target position of the first dice
        curPosition2 - the position of the second dice
        newPosition2 - the target position of the second dice

      • swapTrackDice

        public void swapTrackDice(Player player,
                          Dice draftDice,
                          Dice trackDice)
        Swap a dice of the track with one of the draft pool. Move enabled by ToolCard5.
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        draftDice - the dice of the draft pool
        trackDice - the dice of the track

      • getRethrownDice

        public Dice getRethrownDice(Player player)
        Get the draft pool dice that has been rethrown with rethrowDice(Player, Dice).
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        Returns:
        the rethrown dice

      • rethrowDice

        public void rethrowDice(Player player,
                        Dice dice)
        Rethrow one dice of the draft pool to be later repositioned using repositionRethrownDice(Player, Position). Move enabled by ToolCard6.
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        dice - the dice of the draft pool to rethrow

      • repositionRethrownDice

        public void repositionRethrownDice(Player player,
                                   Position position)
        Reposition the draft pool dice that has been rethrown using rethrowDice(Player, Dice). Move enabled by ToolCard6.
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        position - the target position of the rethrown dice

      • shakeDices

        public void shakeDices(Player player)
        Shake all the dices of the draft pool. Move enabled by ToolCard7.
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move

      • placeSecondDice

        public void placeSecondDice(Player player,
                            Position position,
                            Dice dice)
        Place the second dice in the same turn. This player will skip the next turn. Move enabled by ToolCard8. FIXME: This move can be done before placing the first dice.
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        position - the target position of the second dice
        dice - the dice to place

      • placeNotAdjacentDice

        public void placeNotAdjacentDice(Player player,
                                 Position position,
                                 Dice dice)
        Place a dice into a position that is not adjacent to that of any other dice. Move enabled by ToolCard9.
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        position - the target position of the dice
        dice - the dice to place

      • flipDice

        public void flipDice(Player player,
                     Dice dice)
        Flip the value of a dice of the draft pool. Move enabled by ToolCard10.
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        dice - the dice of the draf pool to flip

      • replaceDice

        public void replaceDice(Player player,
                        Dice draftPoolDice)
        Replace a dice of the draft pool with a dice in the dice bag. Move enabled by ToolCard11.
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        draftPoolDice - the dice of the draft pool to replace

                         int number,
                         Position position)
        Place the dice that has been drawn after using ToolCard11 choosing its value.
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        number - the value of the dice
        position - the target position

      • moveDicesWithTrack

        public void moveDicesWithTrack(Player player,
                               Dice trackDice,
                               Position oldPosition1,
                               Position newPosition1,
                               Position oldPosition2,
                               Position newPosition2)
        Move two dices of the same color of a dice of the track. Move associated to ToolCard12.
        Parameters:
        player - the player performing this move
        trackDice - the dice of the track
        oldPosition1 - the position of the first dice to move
        newPosition1 - the target position of the first dice
        oldPosition2 - the position of the second dice to move
        newPosition2 - the target position of the second dice
